Package vodsystemfx.classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Daemon
    Class is responsible for managing threads: creating new for users and safely stoping dsitributors and users.
    Distributor
    Distributor is responsible for adding new products (movie, series or stream) to the system.
    Episode
    Episodes are part of seasons
    FileWorm
    This class is used to avoid code duplication, because reading from file is often used in application.
    Movie
    Movie is kind of product that can be purchased any time but user has 3 months to watch it as much as he wants before it is removed from user's list.
    Product
    Products are added to system by distributors or by system administrator.
    Randomize
    Used to avoid code duplication
    Season
    Season is part of every Series.
    Serialization
    Class is responsible for saving program state when closing program and for bringing it up after launching.
    Series
    Series is kind of Product extended by list of seasons and release date.
    Stream
    Stream is kind of Product that can be purchased by user before its streaming date.
    SystemManager
    System Manager is managing global lists of products, users and distributors.
    Time
    Time class is managing time of the system.
    User
    Users are objects that automaticaly appear in system.
